# pm2py

[PM2](https://pm2.keymetrics.io/) Programmatic API for Python

## ✨ Features

- [x] List
- [x] Real-Time Logs
- [x] Start
- [x] Stop
- [x] Restart
- [x] Delete

## 📦 Install

You can easily install with [pip](https://pypi.org/).

```sh
pip3 install pm2py
```

## 🔎 Examples

You should check [example](https://github.com/yusufusta/pm2py/tree/master/example.py) file.
